enhanced_description: MRT Infotech is an agile recruitment and staffing firm recognized in APAC, specializing in providing career opportunities across all levels and sectors. The firm boasts a global presence with strong operations in India and the Middle East, supported by regional offices in India, UAE (Dubai), and USA. They employ an expert team with strong headhunting capabilities, leveraging a wide array of sources including vendor job boards, databases, search tools, search engines, forums, alumni networks, associations, directories, and industry events to identify top talent. MRT Infotech offers recruitment process outsourcing (RPO), managed consulting services, and executive search, serving a diverse client base across industries such as IT Services, FMCG, FMCD, Retail, Telecom, E-commerce, BFSI, Manufacturing, Agro & Agriculture, Healthcare, Pharma, Education, Hospitality, and Life Science. Their strengths include a highly skilled talent pool built on referrals and successful partnerships, and exceptionally skilled recruiters adept at global talent identification. The firm prides itself on an 85% fill ratio for open positions.
